main event: Capt. James R. observed a white, star-like object pulsating and changing brightness at Adair AFS, Oregon.
interesting points: The object appeared and disappeared from view several times during the observation period.,The sighting lasted for about 15 minutes.,The object illuminated the surrounding area when it brightened.,The sighting was evaluated to be probably reliable.,The object had no perceptible movement and faded possibly due to clouds.
witness description: Capt. James R. from AFB, Oregon
